mapper.sql:
id, name, folder_name, file_name, big_class, module, no_order, if_in, nav, ( CASE WHEN nav = 0 THEN '不显示' WHEN nav = 1 THEN '头部导航' WHEN nav = '3' THEN ' 尾部导航' WHEN nav = '4' THEN '都显示' ELSE '不显示' END ) AS nav_name,
ctitle, keywords, list_order, new_windows, class_type, out_url, index_num, access, index_img, column_img, is_show, lang, name_mark, rele_class, display, add_class
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
